Issue.creator: rajkumarsomasundaram
Issue.summary: failed to register admin : Identity or token does not match
Issue.description: In one Terminal I ran docker compose up. 2-->In another I went to the directory containing my chaincode and ran 3-->CORE_CHAINCODE_ID_NAME=mycc CORE_PEER_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:7051 ./chaincode In the 3rd terminal I ran my app.js in this way: CORE_CHAINCODE_ID_NAME=mycc CORE_PEER_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:7051 MEMBERSRVC_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:7054 DEPLOY_MODE=dev node app.js >
